name: investbrain
tagline: A self-hosted investment tracking and portfolio analytics platform
description: Investbrain is a self hosted investment tracking and analytics tool. It aggregates portfolio positions, prices and performance, then displays charts and summaries to help individual investors understand risk, returns, and diversification over time.

features.title: Investment Portfolio Tracking
features.description: Tracks investment portfolios including assets holdings and balances

features.title: Transaction Recording
features.description: Records buy sell dividend and transfer transactions

features.title: Performance Analysis
features.description: Calculates investment performance over time using historical data

features.title: Asset Allocation Overview
features.description: Displays portfolio distribution across asset types

features.title: Historical Charts
features.description: Visualizes portfolio value and performance trends

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Imports investment data from supported sources

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Manages portfolios through a browser-based interface

features.title: Self-Hosted Investment Tracker
features.description: Runs the application on your own servers
